text: Faton Xhemaili (/Faton Džemaili; born 15 November 1998) is a Serbian-born Albanian football defender who plays for KF Skënderbeu Korçë in Albanian Superliga. ==Club career== Born in Biljača, part of Bujanovac Municipality, located within Preševo Valley, a region in Serbia with Albanian majority. Xhemaili started playing in the youth team of FK Veliki Trnovac from where he moved to Germany in summer 2016 to play in the youth side of TSV Schott Mainz in the season 2016–17.FUDBALSKI TRANSFERI Faton DžEMAILjI prešao iz Velikog Trnovca u nemački MAJNC at infovranjske.rs, 19-9-2016, retrieved 21-7-2019 Faton Xhemaili at srbijafudbal.com, retrieved 19-7-2019 In summer 2017 he returned to Serbian and joined the youth team of FK Radnik Surdulica. Being a newly promoted club to the Serbian SuperLiga, Radnik was looking for ways to challenge the vast majority of clubs in the league which were already established clubs at Serbian top-level. One way the club from Surdulica tried to diminish the gap was by recruiting talented Albanian players originally from the neighbouring Preševo valley and Kosovo.Two Albanian footballers playing in the Serbian Superliga (Video) at telegrafi.com, 2-11-2017 Among them, the highlights go to Ilaz Zylfiu from Miratovac who was playing at local side Murina, and the other was Xhemaili, whose regular performances in the youth team of semi-professional German side TSV Schott MainzFaton Xhemaili at zerozero.pt gave a positive indication about his future potential and quality. However, during the preparations for the second-half of the season in winter 2017, it became clear both Xhemaili and Zylfiu would be in the group of youngsters needing more experience, and were selected to be placed at loan for the next period. For Exhemaili this meant being sent on loan to FK Budućnost Popovac in the Serbian third tier for the next 6-months. During this time, both Football Association of Albania and Albanian clubs turned their focus on footballers from abroad which were either Albanian or had Albanian background. Upon returning from the loan in summer 2018, Xhemaili stayed with the first- team playing with them the first-half of the 2018–19 Serbian SuperLiga, however, he received very few opportunities, being 11 times on the bench but making only one league appearance, and one in the Serbian Cup.Faton Džemaili at worldfootball.net This is when in the winter-break of that season, Radnik Surdulica accepts an offer from Albanian Superliga side FK Kukësi, a move that proved to be good for the player as he made seven appearances in the same half-season time as let-defender.Faton Dzedmaili at footballdatabase.eu He finished the season in second place in the 2018–19 Albanian Superliga, and also won his first trophy, the 2018–19 Albanian Cup.Faton Džemaili at Soccerway ==International career== In November 2018, Albanian U-21 national team coach Alban Bushi, called the attention of the Albanian media to Xhemaili as a perspective left-winger playing in Serbian top-flight, and as a probable near-future member of the Albanian national team.Xhemaili from the Presevo Valley can join the Albanian national team U21 at titulli.com, 7-11-2018 He made his debut a day after his 20th birthday in a friendly game against Malta by entering as substitute in 76th minute of the game, which ended as a 2:0 Albanian win.Albania vs Malta (U21) at mfa.com.mt ==Honors== ;Kukësi * Albanian Cup: 2018–19 ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Preševo Category:Serbian people of Albanian descent Category:Association football defenders Category:Serbian footballers Category:Albanian footballers Category:Albania under-21 international footballers Category:FK Radnik Surdulica players Category:FK Kukësi players Category:KF Skënderbeu Korçë players Category:Serbian SuperLiga players Category:Albanian Superliga players Category:Albanian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Albanian expatriate sportspeople in Germany
title: Faton Xhemaili
